statements: SELECT * FROM assets_metadata ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets_metadata WHERE asset_size > 100000;
SELECT asset_id, asset_path FROM assets_metadata WHERE asset_type = 'Image' ORDER BY asset_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM assets_metadata WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' AND created_at < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY asset_size DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_type, asset_name FROM assets_metadata ORDER BY asset_size ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM assets_metadata WHERE asset_type = 'image' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_size FROM assets_metadata WHERE asset_size > 100000 ORDER BY asset_size ASC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_path FROM assets_metadata WHERE asset_path LIKE '%/images/%' ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, created_at FROM assets_metadata WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_id, asset_type, asset_size FROM assets_metadata WHERE asset_type IN ('video', 'document') ORDER BY asset_size DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM textures WHERE texture_type = 'wood'
SELECT texture_name, file_path FROM textures ORDER BY texture_name DESC
SELECT * FROM models WHERE model_type = 'furniture' ORDER BY model_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT model_name, model_type FROM models WHERE model_type IS NOT NULL
SELECT texture_name, texture_type, file_path FROM textures JOIN models ON textures.texture_id = models.model_id
SELECT * FROM models;
SELECT model_name, model_type FROM models WHERE model_type = '3D';
SELECT model_name, model_type, file_path FROM models ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT model_name, texture_name FROM models JOIN textures ON models.model_id = textures.texture_id;
SELECT model_name, texture_name FROM models JOIN textures ON models.model_id = textures.texture_id WHERE model_type = '3D';
SELECT * FROM textures;
SELECT texture_name, resolution FROM textures WHERE file_size > 10000;
SELECT texture_id, texture_name, resolution FROM textures ORDER BY texture_name DESC;
SELECT model_name, file_location FROM models WHERE vertex_count < 5000;
SELECT sound_name, format FROM sound_files WHERE duration > '00:05:00';
SELECT * FROM textures WHERE resolution = '1024x768';
SELECT texture_name, file_size FROM textures WHERE texture_name LIKE 'bricks%';
SELECT texture_name, resolution FROM textures WHERE texture_id = '1fd51e07-f91c-44ec-bae2-0aa48a1c8a14';
SELECT model_name, vertex_count FROM models WHERE vertex_count > 5000 ORDER BY vertex_count DESC;
SELECT sound_name, duration FROM sound_files WHERE format = 'mp3' ORDER BY duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM textures;
SELECT texture_name, resolution FROM textures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, model_name, author FROM models WHERE triangle_count > 1000;
SELECT file_name, format FROM sound_files WHERE duration > '10s';
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE type = 'character';
SELECT * FROM textures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT texture_name, resolution FROM textures WHERE format = 'PNG';
SELECT * FROM models ORDER BY triangle_count DESC;
SELECT asset_name, type, description FROM game_assets WHERE type = 'character';
SELECT model_name, author FROM models WHERE author IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM textures;
SELECT model_name, file_path FROM models;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, type FROM game_assets WHERE type = 'model';
SELECT texture_name AS name, file_path AS path FROM textures ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT sound_name, file_path FROM sound_files WHERE sound_name LIKE '%music%';
SELECT * FROM textures WHERE texture_name = 'Wooden Floor';
SELECT * FROM models WHERE model_name = 'PlayerModel' AND file_path = '/models/player.obj';
SELECT asset_name, type FROM game_assets WHERE type = '3D Model' ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sound_files WHERE sound_name LIKE '%explosion%' ORDER BY sound_name DESC;
SELECT asset_id, related_asset_id FROM asset_relations WHERE asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
